alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:01PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN TODD...WEST CENTRAL TRIPP AND SOUTHEASTERN MELLETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 1001 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles south of Butte Creek to near Antelope. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Haystack Butte around 1005 PM CDT. Okreek around 1010 PM CDT. Hidden Timber around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Carter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
